Apache log4j 1.2 Roadmap

Apache log4j 1.2 is mature and widely deployed. Significant changes are unlikely. Bug fixes and maintenance releases are anticipated. New features may still be added either in log4j proper or more likely incorporated into extras or one of the other companion products.
